hero.title: We Power Creativity
hero.subtitle: born on set, built for production.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2014 by a group of cinematographers and engineers, TFS began with a simple mission: to bridge the gap between complex technology and pure creative expression.
story.p2: Today, we are the industry standard for production support, offering an ecosystem of rentals, logistics, and technical expertise that empowers filmmakers to push boundaries without compromise.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that drive every prep.

reliability.title: Unmatched Reliability
reliability.description: Gear that works. Every time. Our QA process is the most rigorous in the industry.

speed.title: Production Speed
speed.description: We know time is money. Our logistics network ensures your kit arrives before you do.

innovation.title: Technical Innovation
innovation.description: We don't just rent gear; we modify and improve it to suit modern workflows.

cta.title: Join the Family
cta.subtitle: Experience the difference on your next production.
